TopicTitle: Moving or resizing Kerbals in an IVA, can it be done using the config file?

Articles.Content: I have been resizing some cockpits to use in some projects. Moving props is no problem but I can't work out how to move or resize the Kerbals so they are the right size or position in the resized cockpit. Is there a way to do this in the IVA config file?
No it can't. Any attempt to resize an IVA in config causes the Kerbals to become distorted. All work needs to be done in the 3d editing program of your choice.
